Text.Page:
One of our archaeologists—if you can call her approach “archaeology”—has wandered off again. Nema's reckless. I can't be bothered to see what she's gotten herself into again.

Talk to {@LinkCreature:218#1022$$Mirak} and see if he sent her somewhere.

{@LinkCreature:218#1007#Nema}, you say? I know her. Better than I wish to.

No, she's not here. Despite my warnings, she snuck out again. I'm ready to kill her myself if she's not already dead."Where would she have gone?"

I'm sure she's gone to the Temple of Tithus. She slips away whenever nobody's looking. There are three things I hate the most in the world: cultists, scorpions, and Nema's curiosity!

If you want to find her, you're on your own. I'm through with her.

Mirak doesn't like someone? Shock. I might be a special pain in his side, though.

Still, I don't know why he thinks I'd stay in camp when I could be out examining things like this!
